summary: THE FRONT SEAT PASSENGER AND FRONT SEAT DRIVER DOOR HAS FAILED AND THE DOOR CAN NOT OPENED FROM THE INSIDE OF THE VEHICLE. THE PASSENGER DOOR OPENER WAS REPAIRED ONE AND A HALF YEARS AGO AND THE DRIVER DOOR IS BEING REPAIRED ON JULY 18, 2017.  IN THE EVENT OF AN ACCIDENT, EGRESS FROM THE VEHICLE IS PROBLEMATIC. THE WINDOW MUST LOWERED AND THE DRIVER MUST REACH OUTSIDE TO OPEN THE DOOR FROM THE OUTSIDE.
